snippet: At a shooting ground in Dover Plains, N.Y., a writer tries her hand at a sporting clays course — “golf with shotguns” — with friends.
abstract: Kathryn Shattuck travels to Beretta Shooting Grounds in Dover Plains, NY, to shoot clay pigeons with several of her New York City friends.
lead_paragraph: At a shooting ground in Dover Plains, N.Y., a writer tries her hand at a sporting clays course — “golf with shotguns” — with friends.

headline.seo: Women Try Beretta Shooting Grounds at Dover Furnace
headline.main: The Pigeons Are Clay and Play Hard to Get
headline.print_headline: The Pigeons Are Clay and Play Hard to Get
